text:
@GregAbbott_TX Opening up TX following the highest # of #COVID19 deaths in one day is like opening up a school of 29 million students while a shooter is active on its campus. 
It’s irresponsible, unacceptable and cruel. 
Shame on you!
#TheCrueltyIsThePoint
